Address.value: 3300 ENTERPRISE PARKWAY, BEACHWOOD, Ohio, 44122, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: SITE Centers Corp is a United States-based self-administered and self-managed REIT that operates as a fully integrated real estate company. The company is the owner and manager of open-air shopping centers that provide a compelling shopping experience and merchandise mix for retail partners and consumers.

value.name: John M. Cattonar
